jProtocol.tls12.model.ciphersuites

Class TlsEncryptionParameters

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TlsEncryptionParameters(long sequenceNumber, byte[] encryptionWriteKey, byte[] macWriteKey, byte[] writeIv)
      Creates an encryption parameters object containing values used in the encryption operation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getEncryptionWriteKey()
      The server or client write encryption key.
      byte[] getMacWriteKey()
      The server or client write MAC key.
      long getSequenceNumber()
      The current write or read sequence number.
      byte[] getWriteIv()
      The server or client write IV used as implicit nonce for AEAD ciphers.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TlsEncryptionParameters

        public TlsEncryptionParameters(long sequenceNumber,
                               byte[] encryptionWriteKey,
                               byte[] macWriteKey,
                               byte[] writeIv)
        Creates an encryption parameters object containing values used in the encryption operation.
        Parameters:
        sequenceNumber - the current sequence number
        encryptionWriteKey - the encryption write key (server or client)
        macWriteKey - the MAC write key (server or client)
        writeIv - the write IV (server or client)

      • getWriteIv

        public byte[] getWriteIv()
        The server or client write IV used as implicit nonce for AEAD ciphers.
        Returns:
        the write IV
